name: Microbes and Machines
description:
Microbes and Machines is a game where you control a little bubble robot that fights against the forces of evil.
The machines were corrupted by the monsters and only one sector was unaffected. The little bubble robots are ready to restore balance.

  • Explore the map to find special chests...but wait...?


  • You'll need a key, of course!


  • Improve your weapon's attributes by collecting marbles in strange machines like this:


  • Reach the next level.
  • Get stronger.
  • Destroy your enemies.


  • Create your own build in this fun and satisfying roguelike.
